messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

oracle issue issue hello have problem with kindly ask if you can help with asap was vacation during weeks weeks displayed manage cards thought added again for tried delete delete button displayed manage cards shows error status please help delete explain normal should manage cards or please attached what should with st public holiday entire week was annual leave noticed defect earlier happened such way log for whole week try delete friday deleted try delete for thursday delete button displayed could you please fix kind regards tester
